sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT DISTINCT L2_switch_type 
FROM dbo.vb_tbl_job a
JOIN dbo.vb_tbl_trigger b ON a.trigger_id = b.trigger_id
WHERE b.trigger_name = '@{pipeline().parameters.Trigger}'

SELECT DISTINCT L3_switch_type 
FROM dbo.vb_tbl_job a
JOIN dbo.vb_tbl_trigger b ON a.trigger_id = b.trigger_id
WHERE b.trigger_name = '@{pipeline().parameters.Trigger}'

SELECT DISTINCT L4_switch_type 
FROM dbo.vb_tbl_job a
JOIN dbo.vb_tbl_trigger b ON a.trigger_id = b.trigger_id
WHERE b.trigger_name = '@{pipeline().parameters.Trigger}'

source.sqlReaderQuery: select max(WatermarkValue) as oldWatermark from watermarktable
select max(LastModifytime) as newWatermark from data_source_table

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * from data_source_table where LastModifytime >
'@{activity('GET LAST WATERMARK').output.firstRow.oldWatermark}' and LastModifytime <= '@{activity('GET NEW WATERMARK').output.firstRow.newWatermark}'
